Discover Bvlgari B.Zero1 collection:

node.text:
Watch as @lucia_silvestri takes you on a journey of color. In this video, the Bvlgari Creative Director invites you into the world of the Magnifica collection — giving you an exclusive look at some vibrant gemstones and dreamlike jewels.
.
.
Video by: @spkmore 
Music @guazzonemarco 
Cover by @monsieurtok 
Galleria images:
Director @tommaso.ottomano / DOP @mrcodepa / Production @studio.april 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Like a portal into a fantastical world, the architecture of the Eternal City gives our muses a gateway into a dreamlike Rome. Watch as @lilyaldridge, @zendaya, @vittoria, and @lalalalisa_m describe what it was like to peer into the wonder of Magnifica and create Bvlgari’s ethereal Brand Campaign film.
.
.
Director & photographer: @txemayeste
Starring #Lisa #Zendaya #LilyAldridge #VittoriaCeretti for Bvlgari
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #DreamMagnificence #LifeIsMagnificent

node.text:
In this brief look behind the scenes we take you from Italy’s capital to its fashion capital. Inside the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, watch as every second of the show is planned out and meticulously brought to life, celebrating the film’s true stars — the Magnifica High Jewelry collection. 
.
.
Production company @illmatic_film_group_company 
Executive producer @jacopo.pica 
Directed by @gooooooooooooooooooooofy
Producer @annaliasilecchia 
Photographer (cover) @gabrieldelachapelle 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry  #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.title: 'Magnifica' Opera d’Arte — From Rome to Milan.

node.text:
The vibrant inspiration of Rome returns to lift the hearts of the world. Shining into Italy’s fashion capital like a blinding ray of sunshine, Bvlgari presents its most exquisite High Jewelry collection to date. More than the launch of unparalleled works of jewelry craft, this is a resplendent celebration of rebirth. Honored through magnificent muses, music, and Milan, Bvlgari unveils the Magnifica High Jewelry collection at the heart of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
.
.
Models: @vittoria, @lilyaldridge @heconghc, @solangesmith and @blesnyaminher 
Special Guests: @andreabocelliofficial @beatricevenezi 
.
.
Project by @oma.eu
Director @tommaso.ottomano
DOP @mrcodepa
Stylist @sagliogeraldine (studio) @alicegentilucci (galleria)
Music @guazzonemarco 
Production @studio.april
. 
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Milan

node.text:
With two career GRAMMY nominations, seven studio albums, and nearly 3bn streams to his name, this live DJ set from @steveaoki promises to be spectacular. To celebrate the launch of the Bvlgari Aluminium Steve Aoki Special Edition watch, Bvlgari presents Steve Aoki live. Enjoy.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #SteveAoki #LiveConcert #SpecialGuestDJ

node.text:
In honor of the awards, @luxurylaw lays down the law on styling and jewelry for the Oscars. Known as the Image Architect, the fiercely talented super-stylist breaks down how he gets stars like @zendaya red carpet ready. This masterclass also gives you an up-close look at some stunning Bvlgari High Jewelry creations – including the exclusive Magnifica pieces Law used to create Zendaya’s jewelry story for this year's Academy Awards. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #93rdAcademyAwards #AcademyAwards #TheOscars #StarsInBvlgari

node.title: MASTERCLASS BY BVLGARI WITH LAW ROACH

node.text:
To our inspiration. To our incredible home. To the city of countless ancient adventures. To the city of the new stories yet to be lived and told. Celebrate the eternal city allure through the pages of “Bvlgari Roma: Travel Tales for Beauty Lovers” a one-of-a-kind guide to Rome’s renowned glamour.

Happy birthday Rome!

Directed by @oliverhl 
Aerial @snils @gianmarco.gabriele 
Music @federicoderoni 

#Bvlgari #Heritage #History #Roma #NataleDiRoma

node.text:
Unlocking the secrets of Serpenti.
The Bvlgari Watches Creative Director unravels the mystery of this breathtaking High Jewelry watch – the Serpenti Misteriosi Cleopatra. Listen as Fabrizio Buonamassa describes the intricacies of designing a watch within a pure High Jewelry piece, the sheer number of gemstones set into its hexagonal scales, and the unique way this intriguing Bvlgari creation fastens around the wrist. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #SerpentiMisteriosiCleopatra #ColorTreasures #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
A perfect synergy of creative energies.
Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, discusses working with internationally renowned architect, @tadao.ando. Together, they created a timepiece that harmonizes a Japanese expression of the nature of time with uniquely Italian codes of design.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #TadaoAndoLimitedSeries #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

Watch as Lucia shows you dazzling Paraiba tourmaline gems and the breathtaking High Jewelry creations Bvlgari crafts then into.

node.text:
With every record-breaking year, Bvlgari advances its expertise in the design and manufacture of Haute Horology timepieces. Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, shares his thoughts on the past triumphs of the Octo Finissimo collection – and what the new perpetual calendar means for the evolution of the saga.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on September 09, 2021 tagging @lilyaldridge. May be an image of 1 person.

node.text:
Bvlgari’s B.zero1 Big Apple bash.
Some highlights from Bvlgari’s exclusive rooftop party where Bvlgari Ambassador and muse of the Maison, @lilyaldridge rocked this diamond-set B.zero1 necklace. Renowned as the creator of the unexpected, Bvlgari wowed @chloexhalle @sarasampaio @shaninamshaik @camilacoelho and many others VIP guests with its B.zero1 creations.
New York Fashion Week has officially started!
.
.
Photographer: @alicia_shi 
Produced by: @f2max x @maximsap
Video by: @livpeters x @i_am_misch
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #BvlgariBvlgari #StarsInBvlgari

node.text:
Inspired to dare.
This summer, Bvlgari invites you to dream big and asks… what inspires you to dare? Emboldened by these Bvlgari creations, #ZhaoLusi, @lamuyangzi, and #RenMin fearlessly stack a selection of B.zero1 necklaces with the BVLGARI BVLGARI Black watch. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariBvlgari
#StarsInBvlgari #DreamAndDare

node.text:
What’s your most daring dream?
In the spirit of these blinding talents tell us your most daring dream. Brandishing B.zero1 and BVLGARI BVLGARI creations each star embodies dreaming courageously. Featuring @winnieharlow, @lukasabbat, @barbieferreira, @keithpowers, @parisjackson, @reillypatton_, @milesmcmillan, @rainsford, @willpeltz, and @kailandmorris.

Photographer/Director: @remilamande
Creative Direction: @olivia.giletti
DP: @maxwellmbasch
Stylist: @zaraloise
Hair: @diegodasilva_
Makeup: @marcelogutierrez
Set Design: #colindonahue
Production: @northsix

#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariBvlgari 
#StarsInBvlgari #DreamAndDare

node.text:
The perfect time to dream big

@chen_wenqi_ @sosoalive7 and Bvlgari Ambassador @real_fanchengcheng are looking fearlessly to the future — each one adorned with this charismatic BVLGARI BVLGARI Black watch alongside these iconic B.zero1 creations.

#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariBvlgari
#StarsInBvlgari #DreamAndDare

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official in Toscana with @bulgariparfums. May be an image of cosmetics, fragrance and text.

node.text:
A new signature scent joins the Bvlgari Man collection.
Fire, wood, glacial air… and now the generosity of Earth. Bvlgari Man Terrae Essence adds the richness of Tuscan soil to the natural elements honored by the Bvlgari Man collection. The vetiver notes of this instinctive new fragrance translate man’s eternal bond with the land into a new masculine Eau de Parfum.
.
.
.
@bulgariparfums #Bvlgari #BvlgariParfums #BvlgariMan #ManTerraeEssence #MenFragrance #Fragrances #Perfume

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on September 07, 2021 tagging @nick__bateman, and @bulgariparfums. May be an image of 1 person, beard, sitting, wrist watch and outdoors.

node.text:
A journey into authenticity. 
Follow @nick__bateman as he journeys to the fertile Tuscan landscape that inspired the new Eau de Parfum, Bvlgari Man Terrae Essence. Exalting the richness of earth, this unprecedented fragrance combines two types of vetivers into a rich masculine scent.
.
.
.
@bulgariparfums #Bvlgari #BvlgariParfums #BvlgariMan #ManTerraeEssence #MenFragrance #Fragrances #Perfume

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on September 07, 2021. May be an image of cosmetics, fragrance and text.
Photo by BVLGARI Official in Toscana with @bulgariparfums. May be an image of cosmetics, fragrance and text.

node.text:
Discover the essence of Earth.
Presenting Bvlgari Man Terrae Essence, a new Eau de Parfum that translates the richness of Tuscan soil into a truly authentic fragrance. This new signature scent of the Bvlgari Man collection exalts the generosity of nature through its woody vetiver facets.
.
.
.
@bulgariparfums #Bvlgari #BvlgariParfums #BvlgariMan #ManTerraeEssence #MenFragrance #Fragrances #Perfume

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on September 06, 2021.

node.text:
Sketching hypnotic perfection.
Watch as we bring the Maison’s creative process to life through animation. To realize Bvlgari’s dream for the Magnifica Serpenti Hypnotic Emerald, the creative team carefully sketches every detail of the necklace — ready for master artisans to craft the finished design into reality. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #VeniceFilmFestival2021 #VeniceFilmFestival

node.text:
A mesmerizing Magnifica masterpiece.
The Magnifica Serpenti Hypnotic Emerald is a truly captivating High Jewelry necklace. Alongside the unmissable central emerald, the emblem’s iconic long body is expertly set with precious diamonds and emeralds. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Serpenti #VeniceFilmFestival2021 #VeniceFilmFestival

node.text:
Magnificence in the making.
Follow the journey of the Magnifica Serpenti Hypnotic Emerald as Bvlgari crafts a celebration of this luscious green stone. Thanks to Bvlgari’s creative use of its snake emblem, this unique piece glorifies an exceptional emerald without taking any light away from the gem. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariMagnifica #BvlgariHighJewelry #VeniceFilmFestival2021 #VeniceFilmFestival

node.text:
Zendaya turns the red carpet green.
Watch as @zendaya hits the red carpet in luscious Bvlgari High Jewelry. The ‘Dune’ actress is always the center of attention. But the added allure of this incredible Magnifica Serpenti Hypnotic Emerald necklace made her arrival truly unforgettable. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #VeniceFilmFestival2021 #VeniceFilmFestival #StarsInBvlgari
